alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 08 at 9:06PM CST until March 10 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THURSDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Portions of west central Minnesota and northeast South Dakota. * WHEN...From 9 AM Thursday to midnight CST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Prior to the onset of snow by Thursday morning, areas of freezing drizzle are possible at times tonight. A light glaze of ice coating is possible, especially on bridges and other elevated surfaces.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Minnesota, the latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1. In South Dakota, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
